item.text: At that time Judah left his brothers and stayed with an Adullamite man named Hirah.

<st data-num="08033" class="">There</st> <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st> <st data-num="07200" class="">saw</st> the <st data-num="01323" class="">daughter</st> of a <st data-num="03669" class="">Canaanite</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> <st data-num="08034" class="">named</st> <st data-num="07770" class="">Shua</st>.<n id="1" /> Judah <st data-num="03947" class="">acquired</st> her <st data-num="03947" class="">as a wife</st><n id="2" /> and <st data-num="0935" class="">slept</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">with</st> her.<n id="3" />

She <st data-num="02029" class="">became pregnant</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="03205" class="">had</st> a <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st>. Judah <st data-num="07121 08034">named</st><n id="2" /> him <st data-num="06147" class="">Er</st>.

She <st data-num="02029" class="">became pregnant</st> <st data-num="05750" class="">again</st> and <st data-num="03205" class="">had</st> another <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st>, whom she <st data-num="07121 08034">named</st> <st data-num="0209" class="">Onan</st>.
Then she had yet another son, whom she named Shelah. She gave birth to him in Kezib.
Judah acquired a wife for Er his firstborn; her name was Tamar.
But Er, Judah’s firstborn, was evil in the Lord’s sight, so the Lord killed him.
Then Judah said to Onan, “Sleep with your brother’s wife and fulfill the duty of a brother-in-law to her so that you may raise up a descendant for your brother.”

But <st data-num="0209" class="">Onan</st> <st data-num="03045" class="">knew</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">that</st> the <st data-num="02233" class="">child</st><n id="1" /> would <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="01961" class="">be considered</st> his.<n id="2" /> So <st data-num="01961 0518">whenever</st><n id="3" /> he <st data-num="0935" class="">slept</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">with</st><n id="4" /> his <st data-num="0251" class="">brother’s</st> <st data-num="0802" class="">wife</st>, he <st data-num="07843" class="">wasted</st> his emission on the <st data-num="0776" class="">ground</st><n id="5" /> <st data-num="01115" class="">so as not</st> to <st data-num="05414" class="">give</st> his <st data-num="0251" class="">brother</st> a <st data-num="02233" class="">descendant</st>.
What he did was evil in the Lord’s sight, so the Lord killed him too.

Then Judah said to his daughter-in-law Tamar, “Live as a widow in your father’s house until Shelah my son grows up.” For he thought, “I don’t want him to die like his brothers.” So Tamar went and lived in her father’s house.
After some time Judah’s wife, the daughter of Shua, died. After Judah was consoled, he left for Timnah to visit his sheepshearers, along with his friend Hirah the Adullamite.

<st data-num="08559" class="">Tamar</st> was <st data-num="05046 0559">told</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="02009" class="">Look</st>, your <st data-num="02524" class="">father-in-law</st> is <st data-num="05927" class="">going up</st><n id="2" /> to <st data-num="08553" class="">Timnah</st> to <st data-num="01494" class="">shear</st> his <st data-num="06629" class="">sheep</st>.”

So she removed her widow’s clothes and covered herself with a veil. She wrapped herself and sat at the entrance to Enaim which is on the way to Timnah. (She did this because she saw that she had not been given to Shelah as a wife, even though he had now grown up.)
When Judah saw her, he thought she was a prostitute because she had covered her face.

He <st data-num="05186" class="">turned aside</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> her <st data-num="0413" class="">along</st> the <st data-num="01870" class="">road</st> and <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="03051" class="">Come</st>, <st data-num="04994" class="">please</st>, I want to <st data-num="0935" class="">sleep</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">with</st> you.”<n id="1" /> (He did <st data-num="03588 03808">not</st> <st data-num="03045 03588">realize</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">it</st> was his <st data-num="03618" class="">daughter-in-law</st>.) She <st data-num="0559" class="">asked</st>, “<st data-num="04100" class="">What</st> will you <st data-num="05414" class="">give</st> me <st data-num="03588" class="">so that</st> you may <st data-num="0935" class="">sleep</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">with</st> me?”

He <st data-num="0559" class="">replied</st>, “<st data-num="0595" class="">I</st>’ll <st data-num="07971" class="">send</st> you a <st data-num="01423" class="">young</st> <st data-num="05795" class="">goat</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="06629" class="">flock</st>.” She <st data-num="0559" class="">asked</st>, “<st data-num="0518" class="">Will</st> you <st data-num="05414" class="">give</st> me a <st data-num="06162" class="">pledge</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">until</st> you <st data-num="07971" class="">send</st> it?”<n id="1" />

He <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="04100" class="">What</st> <st data-num="06162 0834">pledge</st> should I <st data-num="05414" class="">give</st> you?” She <st data-num="0559" class="">replied</st>, “Your <st data-num="02368" class="">seal</st>, your <st data-num="06616" class="">cord</st>, and the <st data-num="04294" class="">staff</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that’s</st> in your <st data-num="03027" class="">hand</st>.” So he <st data-num="05414" class="">gave</st> them to her, then <st data-num="0935" class="">slept</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">with</st> her,<n id="1" /> and she <st data-num="02029" class="">became pregnant</st> by him.
She left immediately, removed her veil, and put on her widow’s clothes.
Then Judah had his friend Hirah the Adullamite take a young goat to get back from the woman the items he had given in pledge, but Hirah could not find her.

He <st data-num="07592 0559">asked</st> the <st data-num="0582" class="">men</st> who were <st data-num="04725" class="">there</st>,<n id="1" /> “<st data-num="0346" class="">Where</st> is the <st data-num="06948" class="">cult prostitute</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="01931" class="">who</st> was at <st data-num="05879" class="">Enaim</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="01870" class="">road</st>?” But they <st data-num="0559" class="">replied</st>, “There has <st data-num="01961" class="">been</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">no</st> <st data-num="06948" class="">cult prostitute</st> <st data-num="02088" class="">here</st>.”

So he <st data-num="07725" class="">returned</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> <st data-num="03063" class="">Judah</st> and <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “I <st data-num="03808" class="">couldn’t</st> <st data-num="04672" class="">find</st> her. <st data-num="01571" class="">Moreover</st>, the <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st> of the <st data-num="04725" class="">place</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, ‘There has <st data-num="01961" class="">been</st> <st data-num="03808" class="">no</st> <st data-num="06948" class="">cult prostitute</st> <st data-num="02088" class="">here</st>.’”
Judah said, “Let her keep the things for herself. Otherwise we will appear to be dishonest. I did indeed send this young goat, but you couldn’t find her.”
After three months Judah was told, “Your daughter-in-law Tamar has turned to prostitution, and as a result she has become pregnant.” Judah said, “Bring her out and let her be burned!”

While they were <st data-num="03318" class="">bringing</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">her</st> <st data-num="03318" class="">out</st>, <st data-num="01931" class="">she</st> <st data-num="07971" class="">sent</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">word</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> her <st data-num="02524" class="">father-in-law</st>: “<st data-num="0595" class="">I</st> am <st data-num="02030" class="">pregnant</st> by the <st data-num="0582" class="">man</st> to <st data-num="0834" class="">whom</st> <st data-num="0428" class="">these</st> belong.”<n id="2" /> Then she <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="05234 04994">Identify</st><n id="3" /> the one to <st data-num="04310" class="">whom</st> the <st data-num="02858" class="">seal</st>, <st data-num="06616" class="">cord</st>, and <st data-num="04294 0428">staff</st> belong.”
Judah recognized them and said, “She is more upright than I am, because I wouldn’t give her to Shelah my son.” He was not physically intimate with her again.
When it was time for her to give birth, there were twins in her womb.

<st data-num="01961" class="">While</st> she was <st data-num="03205" class="">giving birth</st>, one child<n id="1" /> <st data-num="05414" class="">put out</st> his <st data-num="03027" class="">hand</st>, and the <st data-num="03205" class="">midwife</st> <st data-num="03947" class="">took</st> a <st data-num="08144" class="">scarlet thread</st> and <st data-num="07194" class="">tied</st> it <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> his <st data-num="03027" class="">hand</st>, <st data-num="0559" class="">saying</st>, “<st data-num="02088" class="">This one</st> <st data-num="03318" class="">came out</st> <st data-num="07223" class="">first</st>.”

But <st data-num="01961" class="">then</st> he <st data-num="07725" class="">drew back</st> his <st data-num="03027" class="">hand</st>, <st data-num="02009" class="">and</st> his <st data-num="0251" class="">brother</st> <st data-num="03318" class="">came out</st> before him.<n id="1" /> She <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="04100" class="">How</st> you have <st data-num="06555" class="">broken out</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">of</st> the <st data-num="06556" class="">womb</st>!”<n id="2" /> So he was <st data-num="07121 08034">named</st> <st data-num="06557" class="">Perez</st>.<n id="3" />
Afterward his brother came out—the one who had the scarlet thread on his hand—and he was named Zerah.
